revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=REC15A |revision= |upc=850214003713 |asin=B00HWMP6CQ;US; |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/18/2014 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Loopcomm |availability=now |type=range extender |fcc_id=ZTT-REC15A |ic_id=10233A-REC15A |us_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8881AQ |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8881AQ |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8188ER |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Amped_REC15A_2.4, Amped_REC15A_5.0 |default_ssid_regex=^Amped_REC15A_2.4$,,, ^Amped_REC15A_5.0$ |default_ip=192.168.1.240 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|High Power Compact AC Wi-Fi Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/rec15a.html}}
"LPCY0032 V1.2" and a date code of ''1405'' is silkscreened :on the main board in the FCC photos. "PCY0033 V1.1" appears to be silkscreened on the power supply board.
The SoC used by this device is presumed to be RTL8881AQ.. :but the FCC photos are not every good - it's not confirmed. :RTL8188ER may be the 2.4GHz Wi-Fi IC.
===See also=== *[[Amped Wireless RTA1750]] - High Power 800mW AC1750 Wi-Fi Router :[http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00QQ7SLDO Amazon] *[[Amped Wireless TAP-R3]] - High Power Touch Screen AC1750 Wi-Fi Router :[http://www.amazon.com/dp/B013H4AWAS Amazon] *[[Amped Wireless TAP-R2]] - High Power Touch Screen AC750 Wi-Fi Router :[http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00R4N1KKU Amazon] *[[Amped Wireless TAP-EX2]] - High Power Touch Screen AC750 Wi-Fi Range Extender :[http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00WBK0BBU Amazon] *[[Amped Wireless TAP-EX]] - High Power Touch Screen Wi-Fi Range Extender :[http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00O4VADT4 Amazon]
